label: 妃
本: A Tale of Flowering Fortunes:  Annals of Japanese Aristocratic Life in the Heian Period (Volumes One and Two) . Stanford University Press . 1980
説明文: The Yōrō Code made provision for three categories of secondary Imperial consorts:  two Hi, to be members of the Imperial Family; three Fujin, to be daughters of men of Third or higher rank; and four Hin, to be daughters of men of Fifth or higher rank (p. 820). [夫人、嬪]
